Name: Kiritan VS Kanitan ~Zunda-mochi Defense!~
About the game: Kiritan vs Kanitan 'Zunda-mochi defense!' is a 3D tower defense game of Tohoku sisters. Protect zunda-mochi from crabs, jellyfish and other sea creatures in the southern islands. Features: - You can play this game by simple controls. - You can place many attractive characters on the beautiful islands. - The player characters have unique attack and animations. - There are a lot of characters, arrangements and strategies. - It is easy to restart levels, so you can try a lot of strategies as you like.
